mapper.sql: U.ID, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.PARENT_USER_ID, U.PARENT_USER_NAME, U.WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_TYPE, U.WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT, U.WITHDRAW_MONEY, U.WITHDRAW_RPOCEDURE, U.WITHDRAW_TOTAL, U.WITHDRAW_BANKFULLNAME, U.WITHDRAW_ACCOUNTNAME, U.ACCOUNT_BALANCE, U.COMMENT, U.STATUS, U.ORDER_SN, U.ACTIVE, U.CREATE_USER_ID, U.CREATE_USER_NAME, U.CREATE_TIME, U.UPDATE_USER_ID, U.UPDATE_USER_NAME, U.UPDATE_TIME, U.VERSION
mapper.insert: insert into t_withdraw( ID, USER_NAME, USER_ID, PARENT_USER_NAME, PARENT_USER_ID, WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_TYPE, WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT, WITHDRAW_MONEY, WITHDRAW_RPOCEDURE, WITHDRAW_TOTAL, WITHDRAW_BANKFULLNAME, WITHDRAW_ACCOUNTNAME, ACCOUNT_BALANCE, COMMENT, STATUS, ORDER_SN, ACTIVE, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION ) values( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawAccountType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawMoney, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawProcedure, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawTotal, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawBankFullName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawAccountName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountBalance, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{orderSn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_WITHDRAW S SET
S.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.USER_NAME = #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{withdrawAccountType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.WITHDRAW_ACCOUNT = #{withdrawAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.WITHDRAW_MONEY = #{withdrawMoney, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.WITHDRAW_RPOCEDURE = #{withdrawProcedure, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.WITHDRAW_TOTAL = #{withdrawTotal, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.COMMENT = #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.STATUS = #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT},
S.ORDER_SN = #{orderSn, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.ACTIVE = #{active, jdbcType=TINYINT},
S.CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.CREATE_USER_NAME = #{createUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.CREATE_TIME = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
S.UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{updateUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S.UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
S.VERSION = S.VERSION + 1
S.ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND S.ACTIVE = '1'
